item.title: Rick add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rick add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Rick add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Rick add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "The legitimate powers of government extend to such acts only as are injurious to others. It does me no injury for my neighbor to say there are twenty gods or no god. It neither picks my pocket nor breaks my leg." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Rick add a quote by Martin Niemöller
Rick add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Rick add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rick add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I don't care about whose DNA has recombined with whose. When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching--they are your family." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "You're in America now," I said. "Our idea of diplomacy is showing up with a gun in one hand and a sandwich in the other and asking which you'd prefer." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "So. You get handed a holy sword by an archangel, told to go fight the forces of evil, and you somehow remain an atheist. Is that what you're saying?" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "In the name of the Pizza Lord. Charge!" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Rick add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Rick add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I will make Maggie safe. If the world burns because of that then so be it. Me and the kid will roast some marshmallows." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Rick add a quote by Bob Carter
item.description: "Poor planning on your part does not necessitate an emergency on mine." -- Bob Carter
